page.title: 03HOUSING
page.content: Of the populace 64% live in detached houses, 9% in semi-detached and 18% on farms. Of the buildings 18% are under 10 years old, 9% 10 to 40 years old, 18% 40 to 100 years old with 55% over the century mark. From our survey 45% are owner occupiers, 27% rent and 27% live in 'tied' property ie. it goes with the job. Amenities: 64% of houses have a garage, 36% other outbuildings, and very few greenhouses. All homes have grass lawns, with 64% having rough grass in addition. Of the homes 81% have both flower and vegetable gardens, with 45% having soft fruit and 27% fruit trees, 64% of gardens contain coniferous and deciduous trees.
